name: Hamburger
recipe: 1 lb ground beef, 1 egg, 1/4 cup bread crumbs, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp pepper, 4 hamburger buns

name: Mac and Cheese
recipe: 1 lb elbow macaroni, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup flour, 2 cups milk, 2 cups shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper to taste

name: Fried Chicken
recipe: 2 lbs chicken drumsticks, 2 cups buttermilk, 2 cups flour, 2 tsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp garlic powder, oil for frying

name: BBQ Ribs
recipe: 3 lbs pork spare ribs, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup paprika, 1 tbsp garlic powder, 1 tbsp onion powder, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, BBQ sauce

name: Meatloaf
recipe: 1 lb ground beef, 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1/2 cup milk, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1 egg, 2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper

name: Mashed Potatoes
recipe: 4 large potatoes, 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup milk, salt and pepper to taste

name: Chili
recipe: 1 lb ground beef, 1 onion, 1 green pepper, 2 cans kidney beans, 1 can diced tomatoes, 1 can tomato sauce, 2 tbsp chili powder, 1 tsp cumin

name: Cornbread
recipe: 1 cup cornmeal, 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 cup milk, 1 egg, 1/4 cup oil

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
recipe: 2 lbs pork shoulder, 1 onion, 1 cup barbecue sauce, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp smoked paprika, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 4 hamburger buns

name: Buffalo Wings
recipe: 2 lbs chicken wings, 1/2 cup hot sauce, 1/4 cup melted butter, 1 tbsp honey, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipe: 4 slices bread, 2 tbsp butter, 2 slices cheddar cheese

name: Corn on the Cob
recipe: 4 ears of corn, 4 tbsp butter, salt and pepper to taste

name: Potato Salad
recipe: 2 lbs potatoes, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, 1 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper

name: Apple Pie
recipe: 1 pie crust, 6 cups sliced apples, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, 2 tbsp butter
